LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKatana_CP.label: Arasaka Katana
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKatana_CP.description: Arasaka grows their swords in orbit, their crystalline matrices aligned to make a sword that is stronger and sharper than any terrestrial metal. These swords are not sold by Arasaka, but given to their soldiers as a symbol of honor when they are prometed to officers.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKatana_CP.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKatana_CP.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKnife_CP.label: Arasaka combat knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKnife_CP.description: A simple, yet very sturdy combat knife. Well balanced and made from a special iron heavy alloy that allows it to retain an edge even after serious abuse.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKnife_CP.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKnife_CP.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_AKnife_CP.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Battleglove_CP.label: Gibson Battlegear SPM-1 Battleglove
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Battleglove_CP.description: This is a large gauntlet covering the hand and forearm, increasing the power of the user's punches.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainknife_CP.label: chainknife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainknife_CP.description: These chainknives are hand made, similar to the chainknife produced by IMI.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainsword_CP.label: Chainsword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Chainsword_CP.description: These swords have begun to appear at the hands of pirates and raiders. They are all handmade; powered either by combustion engine or electric.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_IMIChainknife_CP.label: IMI Chainknife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_IMIChainknife_CP.description: The IMI Chainknife is a miniature battery powered chainsaw; shaped somewhat like a survival knife with a 2 hour charge. It has seen a great deal of use by espionage agents.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_IMIChainsword_CP.label: IMI Chainsword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_IMIChainsword_CP.description: Since their chain knife sold so well, IMI decided to up the stakes and released a full scale sword. The balance is a bit off, but this weapons will simply tear through just about anything that stands in its way. It comes with a custom sheath.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana_CP.label: katana
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana_CP.description: Katanas were one of the traditionally made Japanese swords that were used by the samurai of ancient and feudal Japan. Today they are popular in asian communities by those who view themselves as rimworld ronin.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana_CP.tools.handle.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana_CP.tools.blade.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana_CP.tools.point.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MonoKatana_CP.label: Kendachi Monokatana
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MonoKatana_CP.description: The monokatana is an incredibally sharp. mono-molecular crystal blade in the style of a katana.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MonoKatana2_CP.label: Kendachi Mono-Two
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_MonoKatana2_CP.description: An improved version of the original Kendachi Monoblade, favored by corporate samurai everywhere. A thicker blade cross section reinforced with Orbital crystal strengthens the weapon against parries.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monoknife_CP.label: Kendachi Monoknife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monoknife_CP.description: The Kendachi MonoknifeÂ® is a melee weapon An incredibly sharp, mono-sectional crystal blade. Produced in the Japanese "tanto" style.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PowerSword_CP.label: Kendachi Powersword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PowerSword_CP.description: Combining elements of the popular Kendachi monoline with a powered handle, the powersword vibrates its molecular crystal blade 2000 per minute. Combined with a microscopically serrated edge, this weapon literally chews its way through anything it encounteres.
